      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Loading of sucrose into the phloem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laden von Saccharose in das Phloem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chargement de sucrose dans le phloème</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carregamento do sucrose no phloem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricamento del saccarosio nel floema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φόρτωση της σακχαρόζης στο φλοίωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cargamento de la sucrosa en el líber</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how sucrose is loaded into the phloem using co-transporter molecules.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">co-transporter molecule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phloem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sucrose</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Saccharose in das 
Phloem mit Co-Transportvorrichtung Molekülen geladen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment le sucrose 
est chargé dans le phloème en utilisant des molécules de 
Co-transporteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como o sucrose é 
carregado no phloem usando moléculas do co-co-transporter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come il saccarosio 
è caricato nel floema usando le molecole del co-trasportatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς η σακχαρόζη 
φορτώνεται στο φλοίωμα χρησιμοποιώντας τα μόρια ομο-μεταφορέων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo la sucrosa se 
carga en el líber usando las moléculas del co-transportador.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Co-Transportvorrichtung Molekül</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
